reporter_caption.center: ANR PIPELINE COMPANY v. DEPARTMENT OF TREASURY, 474 Mich. 936 (2005)

caption.center: ANR PIPELINE COMPANY, Petitioner-Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF TREASURY,

opinion.opinion_text:
SC: 128889, COA: 249056, MTT: 00-273117.
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 3, 2005 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
